name: Catharsis (ProphersorIks, Thomas Ling)
description:
Catharsis

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Fight against your fragmented self and reclaim your sanity.

Controls

WASD to move, space to fire

If you’re hit, you’ll lose some of your abilities. Grab them using your mouse, place them back into their slots, and left click to hammer them back into place.

Credits

Programming: Prophersroiks

Art: Unluckycloverfield

Audio: (Rous) WarrenRAudio

Concept Design + QA Testing: Awesome3475

Made with p5.js
